mapper.sql: id, roomId, user_id, type, duration, url, create_time, active
mapper.select: select a.id, a.roomId, a.user_id, a.type, a.duration, a.url, a.create_time, a.active, b.avatarUrl,b.openId,b.nick_name from t_b_room_content a inner join t_b_mini_user b on a.user_id = b.id and a.roomId = #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.active = 1 and a.id > #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by a.create_time ASC
mapper.insert: insert into t_b_room_content (id, roomId, user_id, type, duration, url, create_time, active) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_b_room_content
id,
roomId,
user_id,
type,
duration,
url,
create_time,
active,

mapper.update:
update t_b_room_content
roomId = #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_b_room_content set roomId = #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
